content.text: In the following chapters you will learn how to repeat code by using loops in PHP.
content.html: In the following chapters you will learn how to repeat code by using loops in PHP.

content.text: Often when you write code, you want the same block of code to run over and over again a certain number of times. So, instead of adding several almost equal code-lines in a script, we can use loops.
content.html: Often when you write code, you want the same block of code to run over and over again a certain number of times. So, instead of adding several almost equal code-lines in a script, we can use loops.

content.text: Loops are used to execute the same block of code again and again, as long as a certain condition is true.
